title: Accidentally bought skin instead of gifting it
body:
So uh... I was going to gift my friend Heartseeker Quinn since he loves playing Quinn and I accidentally bought it because I wasn't paying attention. I used the* refunds long ago so I can't get the RP back but is there anyway a Riot member can help me fix this. I wanted it to be a valentines day gift, but didn't get payed until today and I don't think I'll have enough to put money on and rebuy the skin for him.

tl;dr I messed up my gifting for valentines day and don't think I'll have enough to rebuy it again if I am supposed to

replies.body:
I can't make any promises, but if you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and link this post in your ticket, an account specialist will get back to you and see if there's anything we can do.

If you have any questions, let me know. ^.^

I could wait since the skin would be unavailable the next day, so instead I just put more money into the game ;~;

Thank you anyways!
